评论详情: Outstanding item! Fit and looks perfect!
I feel elegant and like a princess I added a hoop skirt under and it’s so cute
It was a nice dress. The lace you had to do yourself, and it is very long. I bought a corset and a petticoat, and it made it look beautiful. I would recommend. The color was on point too.
Previously worn.  Missing Neck choker.  Package was glued to the dress.

This is a great dress for customization, has a nice look on its own and has lots of ability to change the style. Color is deep green, almost iridescent to black. I did have to hem nearly 5 inches to keep it off the floor, and used a nice wide krenelin, looked great at a Victorian ball. The fabric is nice and heavy, doesn’t feel like a costume at all!

Make sure you order a hoop skirt to go with this to really wear it as it’s intended. I got so many compliments on this dress I wore it to a Victorian Masquerade ball. The back laces up and has a corset panel so if it is snug you can loosen the lacing without showing skin.
The material isn't the nicest, but gosh it's just so pretty! I'd suggest getting a hoop skirt to maximize the
Nothing like photo

I ordered this dress for a Christmas parade and the fit was okay and it is comfortable. However, it arrived covered in black stains and the black under skirt was torn and had a safety pin stuck in it. The neck piece it says it comes with was not even in the box. The bows on the dress were flimsy and seemed like they would come off even though they were sewed on. There are pieces of thread hanging off the dress everywhere. They did not even bother to trim the thread. The dress worked for what I needed it for but DEFINITELY NOT WORTH WHAT I PAID FOR IT.

I purchased this dress last year and was surprised at how nice it looked on (I was an XL at the time). I currently am an M-L and still can wear it because of the convenience of the lace-up synch back. I love this dress and would highly recommend it for a costume or Dickens Fair attire.

评论概述: They are fine, slight flaws, pretty
评论详情: I purchased two dresses, both have flaws, but are gorgeous. The red one is slightly shorter on the left side than the rest of the hem, but is otherwise stunning. It also appears to have been previously returned due to how it was packed, as well as not being pre-strung on the corset back, so I believe I have a used item. The blue dress is an absolute mess, the corset back is drastically crooked, the bows are sewn on sloppily, the back of the dress is gathered oddly, it is absolutely defective. I do not have time to get a replacement in time for the event that I ordered it for, so I will be keeping it, but this dress is very poorly made and clearly was missed by the quality check. Had I not also purchased the red one and seen how beautiful that one was, I would have assumed that this shop is a scam, but I truly think that this specific dress is defective and was missed when shipped out. Overall, the fabric is beautiful, the style is lovely, and i am pleased with half of my purchase. Definitely need a hoop skirt for underneath for fullness.

The dress is aesthetically pleasing, however, it requires a petticoat to achieve the desired flare. The material is of good quality and does not give the impression of being inexpensive. Furthermore, it is versatile and can be worn on multiple occasions. I received numerous compliments when wearing the dress. It is important to note that the dress is longer than expected. Overall, it was a worthwhile purchase and provided good value for the money.
I wore this at a masquerade wine stroll at a plantation . I  had lots of complements and people asking where i  got it. I even had people asking if they could take my picture. Very good quality too.
True to size. Everyone loved it

I love the dress itself, but it doesn’t look right without a petticoat and for my function a petticoat isn’t practical and my husband wasn’t good at securing the tie which is necessary to wear  the dress without my goods falling out, so I had to return it.

This was a great Halloween costume! I was able to steam it easily. We put a hoop skirt underneath it and it worked well. My daughter is 5”4 and 120 lbs and ordered a small. She would have liked it to fit a bit more snuggly, but it worked for Halloween!

Wore it for a Victorian vampire costume. I had ordered 6 other dresses similar and not only was this one the best quality, it was also the best price. Keep in mind this is a costume so don’t expect fine fabrics to be used but it was still very decent. It looked amazing and was very comfortable to wear. I used a hoop skirt under for full skirt effect. Get it!
Love this dress for Halloween, you do need a petticoat with it.
loved how it fit. pretty simple to put on with assistance

The dress is gorgeous in person, exactly as pictured! The sizing was pretty accurate, I normally wear a 12-14 and was able to order a size L and fit comfortably.  The neck piece however was not as pictured sadly. It’s a thick piece of pleated fabric that is not similar to the photo at all. Other than that, it’s a great dress and very pretty for the cost.  The material is comfy as well.
Good cheap costume. Get a helper. It's hard to put on yourself. Corset back. Size up.
Wore this to the Bridgerton Ball...It was so comfy.:.I did get the halo skirt to go to make it poofy...I'm 5' tall and wore a short heel and had no problems with stepping on my dress...

评论概述: Beautiful and easy to get pn
评论详情: This dress is perfect and beautiful
The costume dress is nice, but the shipment is missing the lace tie up so I can't close the dress and it is missing the chocker.  I was not able to reach Amazon to correct the issue.
It was 100% a costum. Light fabric that swished when you moved. Not worth the price. Sending back. Fit true to size.
Gorgeous. Great quality.  Fits to size.  Laces up back.  Comfortable and well made.
A real eye Cather with the proper jewerly

The dress is really nice, loved the color and fabric look at the shine in day light!. I'm 245lbs 5'5 it fit me with a little extra room if needed by loosing off the corset in the back. The puff sleeve was tight, not super uncomfortable, but since I was going to add the ruffles and pearls to the sleeve I did some adjustments under the armpits for a better fit. Added the bow on the chest pearl and ruffles to the belt and embellishments to each of the bows on the skirt. Wearing a petticoat is a must to give fullness to the skirt and if you can steam the dress it will make the fabric look nice and expensive. I wore the dress to a bridgerton ball everyone was wearing regency style dresses and I got tons of conpliments on my dreess because it look custom made. The dress is nice by itself you won't regret it.

5’6 / 260 /44F ordered 2XL I order this for a Bridgerton event as a last minute back up. It didn’t arrive on time because the card on file was expired. That wasn’t their fault. I love this dress and wish it would have arrived in time , keeping it to find another event to go to I love it that much.
This dress is very elegant and not too heavy. It's made out of a light polyester and ties in the back like a corset.

评论概述: Not as pictured, but works in a pinch
评论详情: You will need a steamer to dewrinkle and a hoop skirt and/or petticoats to get the full effect. Bows are not sturdy and starched as pictured. Had to tack mine down by hand. Fits true enough to size, but I wouldn't spend the money on it again if I saw what it looked like in person first.

I am BEYOND pleased with this purchase! I was a bit nervous but the value for the price is amazing! It’s comfortable, the petticoat I put under it lifts it up perfectly, it’s not too long (I’m pretty short) so I’m not tripping all over it! I like the shiny type of material, it’s light and easy to walk in. I am just so happy! I definitely recommend a nice black petticoat to give it the fluff!

评论概述: Too small, No return after less than a month
评论详情: This  is a beautiful dress, however it did not fit and I cannot return it.

This was perfect for my victorian ball I went too. I did a little altering too it, took off the extra bows and wore it off the shoulder. I also added a bustle. But I got so some compliments. One con, if you are more well endowed on top, the chest is a bit tight.
Price and quality are both good. Purchased for daughters Victoria n themed ball. Not sure why they show the rose wreath headpiece or necklace if it does not come with it.
Dress was stained smh what am I to do with this other then that I would Have been perfect

I attended a Bridgerton birthday ball and this dress was amazing 🤩.. The quality is great, the material is very nice. I’m 5’7, 190 lbs and ordered xxl I would have ordered a smaller size but I didn’t have time to return it so I tightened the back as much as I could. I love it!
My mother loved this dress! It was comfortable and fit her perfectly.

评论概述: Decent dress! HARD to remove wrinkles tho!
评论详情: I ordered an XL and 2XL and my sizes from chest, waist, to hips is 42", 37", 46" and XL fit well! The size chart is definitely true to size. So definitely no need to size up.  Pros: cheap and cute! Looks generally like the photo. Very comfortable! Make sure to wear a Crinoline! And if you are 5'3, you will need heels since it is quite long unless you Hem the black underskirt.  Cons: Red is not as saturated, this was impossible to remove all the wrinkles no matter how hard I tried. With my wrinkle setting on my dryer as well as my steamer. And the lace up back is made of thin ribbon straps so I recommend to be gentle when lacing yourself to not rip it.
Our daughter loved it! It seems to run a little small as she can't clasp/tie the back without having some skin showing. Recommend ordering a size up like we ended up having to do.
Vintage 1880s Christmas Ball.
so gorgeous you do need a hoop skirt under to make it look good but it fits perfect
Fabulous dress ! Beautifully made. Excellent fit. My teenager looks like Scarlet Ohara. Paired with a hoop skirt and clip in ringlets for a stage costume.

This comes in a tiny package and will require pretty timely steaming. It took me about an hour but I am meticulous with costuming. My Halloween costume was an absolute hit, as a Victorian vampire. I wish it had been maybe 10 dollars cheaper but either way I felt like it was worth the money once on. *** you need to purchase a hoop skirt to go beneath this item. The skirt is not as staid and fluffy without one.

The material definitely has a fake plastic feeling to it so probably do not expose it to any heat.  Very walmart halloween costume quality to it. Also the red is quite a bit darker in person not the bright red depicted. The fit of the dress is fine, definitely need something underneath such as a hoop skirt to hold the dress.
I loved wearing this dress to our family's first Bridgerton Ball.

Well so far it's a beautiful dress. I like how flowly it is without a petticoat, but I do cold heartedly recommend that you purchase a petticoat for it. As for the texture, it kinda looks and feels fake and God forbids if you take a iron to it. But Overall, it's beautiful and you get what you pay for.
Muy buena elección. La talla corresponde. Se adapta bien a la cintura. Si ocupa una crinolina para levantar el vest y se vea bombachon
